name: Team Fortress 2 The Fighting Game
description:
This game is based on Team Fortress 2, they are 9 playable characters and stages including 1 boss. Two of them were made by other people, but most of them were made by me. All of the stages were created by other people.

Credits:

Valve: For creating and owning Team Fortress 2
DrKelexo: For making Heavy Weapons Guy character
Zobbes: For making Pyro character
Viper Snake: For making 2fort stage
davismaximus: For making 2 TF2-related stages
Five-seveN-25: For making TF2 halloween stages

And thanks to everyone who created their characters and stages!
